requirement: This code is intended to implement a counter that increments, decrements, or resets its value based on input signals.
provide_code:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FB_Counter
VAR_INPUT
	bUp:BOOL;			(*递增信号输入*)
	bDown:BOOL;			(*递减信号输入*)
	bReset:BOOL;		(*复位、清零信号输入*)
END_VAR
VAR_OUTPUT
	nValue:INT;			(*输出数值*)
END_VAR
